thread.section_title: Sportsden Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsden | www.sportsden.ie | 2 of 2
thread.title: Paul Maguire

author: Paul Maguire
title: Paul Maguire
text:
After been in most of the outdoor sports shops in the country it was great to find such a well stocked shop.
When you have been looking and saving for your new purchase there is nothing worse in my opinion in going into a shop to be told "oh yes we can order that in for you" in my experiance anytime I called to the shop to make a purchase, it was in stock.
The guys are experianced, helpfull and very competitive to deal with, & despite the fact they are well over an hour drive from my home, it is always worth making the trip.
